pennlive.com  (WEB - en-US)

PennLive.com is the website for The Patriot-News in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania.

This website generally maintains basic standards of credibility and transparency.
Does not repeatedly publish false content
Gathers and presents information responsibly
Regularly corrects or clarifies errors
Handles the difference between news and opinion responsibly
Avoids deceptive headlines
Website discloses ownership and financing
Clearly labels advertising
Reveals who's in charge, including any possible conflicts of interest
The site provides names of content creators, along with either contact or biographical information

Ownership and Financing

PennLive and The Patriot-News are owned by Advance Publications Inc., which publishes magazines and newspapers. Advance owns cable television properties, as well as Parade Publications, Fairchild Publications, American City Business Journals, and the Golf Digest Companies.

Content

PennLive publishes text and occasional video stories about central Pennsylvania. The website has done special sections focusing on the Jerry Sandusky abuse scandal at Penn State University and the opioid crisis in Pennsylvania. It also focuses on local college and high school sports.

Credibility

PennLive publishes its own reported stories as well as wire stories from The Associated Press, McClatchy-Tribune, and The Washington Post. Most content is original work by staff journalists. Reporter Sarah Ganim and the staff of The Patriot-News won the Pulitzer Prize for local reporting in 2012 for coverage of the Sandusky sex abuse scandal. Opinion pieces are labeled with an Opinion heading and are located under a separate tab on the website.

Corrections and clarifications are made in the body of the text, and a note at the bottom of the article states what was changed.

Transparency

PennLive labels advertising with a headline reading Sponsor Content. Opinion articles are also labeled as such. Reporter bylines are at the top of stories, as are reporter email addresses.

History

The Patriot-News was founded in 1854.
